directions: Heat the oil in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. Add the yellow squash, zucchini, carrots and onion and stir-fry until the vegetables are tender-crisp.
Stir the concentrated broth in the skillet and cook until the mixture is hot.
ingredients: 1 medium red onion, cut in half and thickly sliced
2 packets Swanson® Flavor Boost™ Concentrated Vegetable Broth
title: Savory Vegetable Stir-Fry
